entry.name: tap
entry.title: tap
entry.desc: Triggered after a quick, complete touch event.

longdesc.p: The jQuery Mobile tap event triggers after a quick, complete touch event that occurs of a single target object. It is the gesture equivalent of a standard click event that is triggered on the release state of the touch gesture.

pre.code:
...
... $(function(){ // Bind the tapHandler callback function to the tap event on div.box $('div.box').bind( 'tap', tapHandler ); // Callback function references the event target and adds the 'tap' class to it function tapHandler( event ){ $(event.target).addClass( 'tap' ); } });

longdesc.p: Tap the square to see the above code applied.

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function to invoke after the the tap event fires.
